				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_chilean_peso_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:chilean_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = chilean_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of chilean_peso sell 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

#colombian_peso

colombian_peso_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = colombian_peso_quantity
				#var:colombian_peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
				var:colombian_peso_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:colombian_peso_quantity < 25000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = colombian_peso_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
colombian_peso_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = colombian_peso_quantity
				var:colombian_peso_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = colombian_peso_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_colombian_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_colombian_peso_state > player.var:colombian_peso_quantity
		buy_colombian_peso_market_panel < player.money_supply
		money_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_colombian_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_colombian_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:colombian_peso_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = colombian_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 1
				var:colombian_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_buy_1 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_colombian_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 2
				var:colombian_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_buy_2 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_colombian_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 3
				var:colombian_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_buy_3 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_colombian_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 4
				var:colombian_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_buy_4 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_colombian_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 5
				var:colombian_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_buy_5 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_colombian_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		
		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = colombian_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of colombian_peso buy 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_colombian_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_colombian_peso_state > player.var:colombian_peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:colombian_peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_colombian_peso_state
		not = {
			player.buy_colombian_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_colombian_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:colombian_peso_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = colombian_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 1
				var:colombian_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_colombian_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 2
				var:colombian_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_colombian_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 3
				var:colombian_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_colombian_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 4
				var:colombian_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_colombian_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order = 5
				var:colombian_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
					value  = var:colombian_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = colombian_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:colombian_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:colombian_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_colombian_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_colombian_peso_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:colombian_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = colombian_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of colombian_peso sell 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

#cuban_peso

cuban_peso_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = cuban_peso_quantity
				#var:cuban_peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
				var:cuban_peso_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:cuban_peso_quantity < 25000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = cuban_peso_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
cuban_peso_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = cuban_peso_quantity
				var:cuban_peso_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = cuban_peso_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_cuban_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_cuban_peso_state > player.var:cuban_peso_quantity
		buy_cuban_peso_market_panel < player.money_supply
		money_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_cuban_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_cuban_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:cuban_peso_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = cuban_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 1
				var:cuban_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_buy_1 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_cuban_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 2
				var:cuban_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_buy_2 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_cuban_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 3
				var:cuban_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_buy_3 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_cuban_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 4
				var:cuban_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_buy_4 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_cuban_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 5
				var:cuban_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_buy_5 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_cuban_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		
		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cuban_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of cuban_peso buy 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_cuban_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_cuban_peso_state > player.var:cuban_peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:cuban_peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_cuban_peso_state
		not = {
			player.buy_cuban_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_cuban_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:cuban_peso_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = cuban_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 1
				var:cuban_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_cuban_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 2
				var:cuban_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_cuban_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 3
				var:cuban_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_cuban_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 4
				var:cuban_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_cuban_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order = 5
				var:cuban_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
					value  = var:cuban_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = cuban_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:cuban_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:cuban_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_cuban_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_cuban_peso_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cuban_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cuban_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of cuban_peso sell 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

#dominican_peso

dominican_peso_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dominican_peso_quantity
				#var:dominican_peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state
				var:dominican_peso_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:dominican_peso_quantity < 25000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dominican_peso_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
dominican_peso_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dominican_peso_quantity
				var:dominican_peso_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dominican_peso_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_dominican_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dominican_peso_state > player.var:dominican_peso_quantity
		buy_dominican_peso_market_panel < player.money_supply
		money_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_dominican_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_dominican_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dominican_peso_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dominican_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 1
				var:dominican_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_buy_1 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dominican_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 2
				var:dominican_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_buy_2 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dominican_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 3
				var:dominican_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_buy_3 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dominican_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 4
				var:dominican_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_buy_4 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dominican_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 5
				var:dominican_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_buy_5 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_dominican_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		
		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dominican_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of dominican_peso buy 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_dominican_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dominican_peso_state > player.var:dominican_peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:dominican_peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_dominican_peso_state
		not = {
			player.buy_dominican_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_dominican_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dominican_peso_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = dominican_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 1
				var:dominican_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dominican_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_sell_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 2
				var:dominican_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dominican_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_sell_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 3
				var:dominican_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dominican_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_sell_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 4
				var:dominican_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dominican_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_sell_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order = 5
				var:dominican_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
					value  = var:dominican_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = dominican_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:dominican_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:dominican_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = sell_dominican_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_dominican_peso_sell_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}

		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:dominican_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = dominican_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of dominican_peso sell 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

#uruguayan_peso

uruguayan_peso_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = uruguayan_peso_quantity
				#var:uruguayan_peso_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
				var:uruguayan_peso_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:uruguayan_peso_quantity < 25000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = uruguayan_peso_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
uruguayan_peso_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = uruguayan_peso_quantity
				var:uruguayan_peso_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = uruguayan_peso_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_uruguayan_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state > player.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
		buy_uruguayan_peso_market_panel < player.money_supply
		money_quantity < player.sell_limit_currency_var_rest
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		not = {
			player.buy_uruguayan_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_uruguayan_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:uruguayan_peso_buy_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = uruguayan_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order = 1
				var:uruguayan_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_buy_1 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value = scope:target.var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_uruguayan_peso_1
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_uruguayan_peso_buy_1
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order = 2
				var:uruguayan_peso_sell_2 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_2 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_buy_2 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
					value = scope:target.var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_2 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_2
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_uruguayan_peso_2
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_uruguayan_peso_buy_2
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order = 3
				var:uruguayan_peso_sell_3 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_3 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_buy_3 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
					value = scope:target.var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_3 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_3
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_uruguayan_peso_3
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_uruguayan_peso_buy_3
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order = 4
				var:uruguayan_peso_sell_4 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_4 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_buy_4 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
					value = scope:target.var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_4 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_4
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_uruguayan_peso_4
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_uruguayan_peso_buy_4
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order = 5
				var:uruguayan_peso_sell_5 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_5 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_buy_5 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
					value  = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
					value = scope:target.var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
				}

				#Player currency to subtract to money_suply
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_subtract_to_money_suply_5 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = var:uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = buy_uruguayan_peso_5
					value  = 1
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = order_display_uruguayan_peso_buy_5
					target = prev
				}
			}
		}
		
		#reset
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = uruguayan_peso_order
				#Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso buy 
				value  = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_uruguayan_peso_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state > player.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
		player.var:sell_limit_currency_var_1 < player.sell_limit_currency_var_0
		player.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity < player.stockpiling_uruguayan_peso_state
		not = {
			player.buy_uruguayan_peso_order_valid = 0
			player = {
				has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_uruguayan_peso_market_panel = {
	is_shown = {
		var:uruguayan_peso_sell_1 > 0
	}
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = uruguayan_peso_order
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:uruguayan_peso_order = 1
				var:uruguayan_peso_sell_1 = 0
			}
			scope:target = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso sell 
					value  = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}

				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_to_player_currency_exchange_rate_1
					value  = {
						value = money_value_rapported_inflation
						divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation 
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_spe_to_add_to_specific_reserves_currency_1 #Player country quantity of currency lost
					value  = {
						value = 0
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
							multiply = {
								add = {
									add = owner.money_value_rapported_inflation
									divide = scope:player_country.money_value_rapported_inflation
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				#Sterling quantity
				set_variable = {
					name = uruguayan_peso_sell_1 #Player country quantity of uruguayan_peso sell 
					value  = var:uruguayan_peso_quantity
				}
				
				#exchange rate
				set_variable = {
